import React from 'react'; import './style.css'; var base64 = require('base-64'); export const email_addresss = email_address class SignUp extends React.Component { state = { username: '', password: '', first_name: '', last_name: '', view: 'password', email: '' } render() { const email_address = this.state.email let id = base64.encode(`first-name: ${this.state.first_name}`) if (this.state.first_name !== '' && this.state.last_name !== '') { alert(id) let decodedId = base64.decode(id) alert(decodedId) } if (window.location !== '/signup') { return (

Thank you for your submission

We will check over the details you put into the sign up page.
Please confirm your email address: {this.state.email}

{// eslint-disable-next-line }Confirm E-mail Address
) } return (

Sign Up











Please Read Before Signing Up


You will not forsure get an account.
This form will be sent to the team of developers and
we will consider giving you an account.
Thank you for visiting,
Sholom Jacks, chief of development.



Sign Up
) } } export default SignUp
